description.value: As a Half Action, can hover 20-30 Centimetres off of the ground for 1d10+TB Minutes. Must use Half Action each round to maintain. This can slow falls, reducing your fall damage to a maximum of 1d10+3 I. Exhausts Potentia Coil, cannot be used until it is recharged.
